name: Promotion Class: Secutor
description:
Role: Melee Defense

A stalwart defender who is a master of fighting with all forms of shields.

Stat Adjustments:
Health +1500
Control Defense +30%
Final Mitigations Cap +15%

Traits Granted:
Axe Mastery
Longsword Mastery
Mace Mastery
Short Sword Mastery
Buckler Mastery
Medium Shield Mastery
Tower Shield Mastery
Plate Armor Proficiency

Enhancements:
Oath Of Will: Now reduces the cost of maintaining block by 75% and causes you to no longer lose additional stamina when blocking big hits for 12 seconds.
Pursuit: Now adds a Barrier.
Chain Attack: Now resets the cooldown on [NOPOWER] after a successful hit.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Secutor promotion class and prevents access to the Swordsman and Sentinel promotion classes.
